user_instruction: 'Send an update to my coworker Sarah (sarah.thompson@cch.org) about our current projects. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{
  "to": [
    "sarah.thompson@cch.org"
  ],
  "subject": "Project Updates: HEAP and Vax4All",
  "body": "Hi Sarah,

Here’s a quick status update on our two active projects:

1. HEAP (Health Empowerment and Awareness Program)
   • Objective: Improve community health literacy through workshops, printed materials, and an online resource hub.
   • Current focus: Finalizing curriculum for the first workshop series and coordinating print vendors for pamphlets.
   • Next steps (this week):
       – Finish slide deck drafts and send to Dr. Patel for medical review (ETA Friday).
       – Confirm community center booking for June 5-7.
   • Needs/asks: Please review the draft pamphlet copy in the shared drive by Thursday.

2. Vax4All Initiative
   • Objective: Increase vaccination rates in Oakwood Village via pop-up clinics and outreach.
   • Current focus: Securing locations and staffing for the June 18 kickoff clinic.
   • Next steps (this week):
       – Submit permit applications to the city (in progress—should be filed tomorrow).
       – Finalize volunteer schedule; I’ll circulate a Google Sheet once numbers are confirmed.
   • Needs/asks: If you have any contacts at Oakwood High for potential clinic space, let me know.

Let me know if I missed anything or if you need additional info.

Thanks!
[Your Name]
Community Health Programs Team"
}

formatted_items.content: I’ve sent Sarah an email with concise updates on our HEAP and Vax4All projects—covering current status, next-step tasks, and items she needs to review. Let me know if you’d like anything tweaked or additional details added!
